info.name: Tag pre word-wrap solution
info.description:
Simple solution for word-wrap text in <pre> and <code> tags, good for forums and code in general. No more forced horizontal scrollbar in pages.

Tested in Firefox 8+, Windows 7 x64.

Style depreciated, is near to impossible make a generic rule for any site.
info.additionalInfo:
01.17.11 - Added more tags and generic class used by sites, fix specially Bugzilla. Not found a solution for this kinda of quote http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?p=10402919#p10402919 yet.
12.27.11 - Improved solution, compatible with Bugzilla and more sites. New screenshots added.
